text: hi.  are you going to donate HIT money to Save the Children?
I am not sure what Save the children is. Do you have information about the organization?
it's a charity for endangered children such as those in the rohingya action:   URL
Ill check out the link quickly
ok.  they protect kids in danger, help them after hurricanes, military actions, etc
Yes i saw the info about Hurricane Harvey. It our katrina anniversary today so yes I will donate as we know first hand
great.  you can donate anything upto $2...
I will donate $1
that sounds like a nominal amount.  are you sure?
Yes unfortunately I am financially strapped and its 50%
yeah.  i understand.  ok.  so $1 it is.
That sound good. So each of us will donate $1?
that sounds fair
how did you learn about this particular charity?
i found it on the internet ...
So many charities just wondering what drew you to this one
it was at the suggestion of somebody here
They seem like they do a good work
it's hard to tell, given all the corruption one hears about with charities - even the red cross, but ... you gotta trust someone sometime
yes but hopefully this helps some
